Class: ArrowOneSide

DrawerJs.plugins.ArrowOneSide(drawerInstance)

new ArrowOneSide(drawerInstance)

Provides an arrow button which can be used to draw lines with arrow at one side.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
drawerInstance DrawerJs.Drawer Instance of DrawerJs.Drawer. Tool is using drawerInstance.options['lineAngleTooltip'] Default settings are: { enabled: false, fontSize: 11, fontFamily: 'Arial, sans serif', color: 'black'};
Source:
  • plugins/shape-arrow/ArrowShape.js, line 20

Extends

  • BaseShape

Members

toolOptionsList :Array.<String>

List of tool options to show when tool is activated. Deviating from BaseShape tool, Arrow has no 'color', only 'border'.
Type:
  • Array.<String>
